fragile.desc: After receiving any [sprIcon,0][sprIcon,1][sprIcon,2]attack, [sprBoost,4]BOOSTs the corresponding DEF
fragile.name: Fragile

vampire.desc: Restores STAMINA equal to 1/6 of damage dealt
vampire.name: Vampire

notag.desc: Prevents nearest non-[sprStatus,5]WIPED opponent from using "Tag Out"
notag.name: Tractor Beam

allyheal.desc: Restores 6 STAMINA to ally each turn
allyheal.name: Rumpus

negation.desc: Ignores additional effects on received attacks
negation.name: Cryptic

lightningrod_m.desc: Is a magnet for all [sprIcon,2] attacks
lightningrod_m.name: Neural Net

spray.desc: When receiving an attack,[sprIcon,0][sprIcon,1][sprIcon,2]POW[sprBoost,3] to opposing team
spray.name: Strong Spray

blocker.desc: When receiving at the net, gets an EASY RECEIVE and feels [sprStatus,8]JAZZED
blocker.name: Blocker

dreadlock.desc: While field has DREAD, this Beastie's attacks make target [sprStatus,0]NERVOUS
dreadlock.name: Unsettling-1

nurture.desc: Restores 20 STAMINA to ally when TAGGED IN
nurture.name: Treat

vicious.desc: Attacks always do at least 30 damage
vicious.name: Vicious

stingblock.desc: Beasties they make [sprStatus,9]BLOCKED also lose 25% of their remaining STAMINA
stingblock.name: Venom Touch

starter_h.desc: [sprIcon,1]Attacks are 50% stronger when STAMINA is below 34
starter_h.name: High Spirits

lifeorb.desc: Attacks do +20% damage, but cost 10 STAMINA
lifeorb.name: Overwork

acidic.desc: When receiving an attack, attacker loses 10 STAMINA
acidic.name: Acidic

flee.desc: TAGS OUT when stamina falls below 50
flee.name: Flee

statswap.desc: While field has RHYTHM, POW and DEF stats are swapped
statswap.name: Mood Swing

acrobat.desc: DEF +50% just after moving or tagging in
acrobat.name: Acrobat

watcher.desc: Receives attacks in place of adjacent allies
watcher.name: Watchtower

avenger.desc: Attacks are 30% stronger while any ally is [sprStatus,5]WIPED
avenger.name: Avenger

fieldclear.desc: Clears FIELD EFFECTS when tagged out
fieldclear.name: Cleanup

empath.desc: Reflects negative FEELINGs back onto enemies
empath.name: Stirring

nodie.desc: Restores instantly from [sprStatus,5]WIPED and just feels 2 [sprStatus,2]SHOOK
nodie.name: Superorganism

starter_b.desc: [sprIcon,0]Attacks are 50% stronger when STAMINA is below 34
starter_b.name: Power Up

shrug.desc: Restores 10 STAMINA after taking any damage
shrug.name: Hardy

steal.desc: Whenever they MOVE or SHIFT, takes the ball from their ally
steal.name: Thief

crowdpow.desc: While field has RALLY, attacks are 50% stronger, but lose 15 STAMINA each turn
crowdpow.name: Performer-2

teleport.desc: Automatically SHIFTs to targeted empty lanes
teleport.name: Stealthy

rhythmblock.desc: While on field with RHYTHM, allies can't be [sprStatus,9]BLOCKED
rhythmblock.name: Flow State

noredirect.desc: This Beastie's attacks always go where they are targeted
noredirect.name: Precise

intimidate.desc: [sprIcon,1]Pow[sprBoost,3] to opponent team when tagged in
intimidate.name: Majesty

fwdpass.desc: When they volley, SHIFTs ally to the net
fwdpass.name: Captain

sturdy.desc: Never takes more than 99 damage at once
sturdy.name: Bunker

crowdheal.desc: Restores 6 STAMINA each turn while field has RALLY
crowdheal.name: Performer-1

taghit.desc: +50% POW when the target has just TAGGED IN
taghit.name: Hunter

heavy.desc: Can't be forced to move by opponents
heavy.name: Heavy

tagheal.desc: Restores 20 STAMINA to an ally that TAGS IN for them
tagheal.name: Supportive

mindless.desc: Non-[sprIcon,0] attacks become [sprIcon,0] and are 30% stronger
mindless.name: Musclebrain

trappow.desc: When they attack, sets +1 TRAP on the opponent field
trappow.name: Trapper

study.desc: After receiving any [sprIcon,0][sprIcon,1][sprIcon,2]attack, [sprBoost,0]BOOSTs the corresponding DEF
study.name: Study

technician.desc: Moves with 60POW or less are 50% stronger
technician.name: Crafty

fetch.desc: Feels [sprStatus,8]JAZZED (POW x1.5) after receiving any attack
fetch.name: Fetch

runner.desc: POW +30% just after moving or tagging in
runner.name: Momentum

straightshot.desc: Attacks are 30% stronger and always target straight ahead
straightshot.name: Launcher

charge.desc: [sprIcon,0][sprIcon,1][sprIcon,2]POW[sprBoost,0] at the end of each turn
charge.name: Charge

sneaky.desc: Makes adjacent allies receive attacks in their place
sneaky.name: Slippery

echo.desc: Attacks are 25% weaker but deal 50% damage to target ally
echo.name: Echo

starter_m.desc: [sprIcon,2]Attacks are 50% stronger when STAMINA is below 34
starter_m.name: Full Focus

defender.desc: Defenses are 30% stronger while any ally is [sprStatus,5]WIPED
defender.name: Survivor

shy.desc: DEF bonus at the net and POW bonus at the back row
shy.name: Shy

notraits.desc: While on the field, nullfies other Beasties' traits
notraits.name: Nullify

static.desc: When receiving an attack, attacker feels 1 [sprStatus,0]NERVOUS (can't move)
static.name: Unpredictable

gloat.desc: When an opponent is [sprStatus,5]WIPED,| this Beastie restores 50 STAMINA
gloat.name: Crowing

statkeeper.desc: Keeps [sprBoost,2][sprBoost,5]BOOSTS while benched and between points
statkeeper.name: Engaged

mimic.desc: Copies nearest opponent's trait when TAGGED IN
mimic.name: Mimicry

bouncy.desc: Bounces the ball to their ally after receiving any attack
bouncy.name: Bouncy

allpow.desc: POW [sprBoost,1]BOOSTS to [sprIcon,0], [sprIcon,1] or [sprIcon,2] give +1[sprBoost,0] to the [sprIcon,0][sprIcon,1][sprIcon,2]other 2
allpow.name: Protean

handsfree.desc: Can use [sprIcon,4]SUPPORT plays while holding ball
handsfree.name: No-Hands

overwrite.desc: Attacks change the target's trait to Overwrite
overwrite.name: Overwrite
